Class Stage

java.lang.Object
backgrounds.Stage
public class Stage extends Object
the backgrounds for each stage, their building methods and draw

    • collisionFinder

      private void collisionFinder(BufferedImage toFind, String typeOfCollider, int level, int xOffset, int yOffset, int width, int heigth)
      called by constructor, searches the sprite of the map and places collision when found the image passed
      Parameters:
      toFind - (image to find)
      typeOfCollider - (the name of the image it is searching for)
      level - (to pass onto the collider creator)
      xOffset - (to pass onto the collider creator)
      yOffset - (to pass onto the collider creator)
      width - (to pass onto the collider creator)
      heigth - (to pass onto the collider creator)
